overview: About the relationship of a man and a woman who, despite the trials that fell to their lot, even in adulthood managed to maintain a taste for life and faith in love. Their feelings have survived the pain of loss and separation, but still have not lost their strength. And although at first the characters try to hide their emotions and experiences, deceive not only each other, but also themselves, as a result, love wins and puts everything in its place...
title: A Close Embrace
